Uses of Interface
agave.Destination

Packages that use Destination
agave Serves as the main interface to Agave for a webapp developer, with the AgaveFilter serving as the Front Controller in a Model-View-Controller architecture, and several annotations to describe how handler methods will field HTTP requests. 
agave.internal The internals of Agave. 
 

Uses of Destination in agave
 

Methods in agave that return Destination
static Destination Destinations.create(java.lang.String path)
          Creates a new Destination within the deployed context.
static Destination Destinations.forward(java.lang.String path)
          Creates a new Destination within the deployed context that will be forwarded to.
static Destination Destinations.redirect(java.lang.String path)
          Creates a new Destination within the deployed context that will be redirected to.
